message.raw:
Removed logging lines from acquisition loop.

This was slowing down fast acquisitions (1MHz over 5s) to the point where the acquisition loop got behind after about 1s and then crashed out.
Commenting out these lines, makes the loop run much faster and we can successfully acuire high sample rate signals.
